content: twinkle star by kathryn ashley-wright size one finished measurements roughly 5 diameter yarn worsted weight - 70 yds supplies us #7 4 5 mm 16 circular and set of 6 dpns one dpn could be a similar size… ring/removable marker tapestry needle gauge 20 sts/24 row = 4 over stockinette stitch gauge is not important in this pattern as long as it s a good firm fit with your yarn in fact try different gauges with different yarns for a variety of stars directions with 16 circular needle cast on 85 sts place a marker and join into the round knit 1 foundation round change to 5 dpns when necessary each repeat should be on 1 dpn round 1 *knit 7 slip 2 k1 p2sso k7 repeat from * 4 more times round 2 *knit 6 slip 2 k1 p2sso k6 repeat from * 4 more times round 3 *knit 5 slip 2 k1 p2sso k5 repeat from * 4 more times round 4 *knit 4 slip 2 k1 p2sso k4 repeat from * 4 more times round 5 *knit 3 slip 2 k1 p2sso k3 repeat from * 4 more times round 6 *knit 2 slip 2 k1 p2sso k2 repeat from * 4 more times round 7 *knit 1 slip 2 k1 p2sso k1 repeat from * 4 more times round 8 * slip 2 k1 p2sso repeat from * 4 more times cut tail and pull through remaining stitches and fasten_off with your circular needle pick up and knit into the center of each cast on outside stitch around the star work rounds 1-8 stuff star with wool before pull tail tight and fastening off abbreviations k knit p purl st s stitch es dpn double pointed needle p2sso pass 2 slipped stitches over www ewetopiafibershop com ©this pattern is for the personal use of the purchaser only it may not be copied and distributed physically or electronically items made from this pattern may not be sold unless given written permission by the designer kathryn ashley-wright please contact ewetopia for further assistance info@ewetopiafibershop com or 102 s main st viroqua wi 54665
